items.name: case constantBitPattern(UInt32)
items.desc: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified bit pattern.

items.name: case constantScalar(Float)
items.desc: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified scalar value.

items.name: case reflect
items.desc: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an odd-symmetric pattern.

items.name: case symmetric
items.desc: A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an even-symmetric pattern.
